item.title: F5 BigIp - Manually Changing Session Persistence Cookies on the Client Side
item.description: Yesterday I was asked to help out a bit debugging issues with a site that sits behind a F5 BIG-IP load balancer (LB). It’s a pretty simple site, load balanced between two web servers. The developers were complaining about intermittent page load issues, so I immediately considered a …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Quick and Simple Timestamping of Debug Logs
item.description: I’ve been having some issues that may be Puppet-related. Unfortunately, Puppet (at least the old 0.25.4 client that I’m running) doesn’t timestamp the debug logs sent to stdout. I know it’s hanging somewhere, but I need concrete numbers to look at. Here’s …
item.dc:creator: admin
